page.title: 02PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {CONKERS}: There are two players each with a conker (horse chestnut) tied to a piece of string.Each player has three attempts in turn at trying to break their opponents conker. { {TRACKING}: A lot of people are split into two groups.One group runs off to hide whilst the other counts to one hundred.Then the counting group run off to capture the other team. { {BRITISH BULLDOG}: Six or more people are needed for this game.First, one person is 'on'.The person who is 'on' calls out one person's name.That person has to run from one side of the playground to the other without being caught.If someone is caught the catcher calls "BRITISH BULLDOG 1,2,3" and then the person captured is 'on' as well.
